newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Unibanco starts as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Unibanco starts as buy.

text.p: -- Santander Investment said on Wednesday it had started coverage of Brazil's Unibanco with a rating of buy.

-- Analysts Vasco Moreno and Allison Kraver wrote in a report that they expected earnings per share to rise to 2.89, 3.92 and 5.13 reais for 1996, 1997 and 1998, respectively, against 2.34 reais in 1995.
-- They set a 12- to 18-month target price of 44.18 reais a share, implying a 32.3 percent rise from the current level.
-- The company's shares were off 0.10 to 32.80 in Sao Paulo on Wednesday.
